flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
LEGAL ADVISORY!!!!!!

IF YOU HURT SOMEONE AND BRING ME TO COURT, I WILL NOT TAKE RESPONSIBILITY AND I WILL PRINT THIS TO SHOW MY ADVISORY!
guide.introduction_rendered:
LEGAL ADVISORY!!!!!!

IF YOU HURT SOMEONE AND BRING ME TO COURT, I WILL NOT TAKE RESPONSIBILITY AND I WILL PRINT THIS TO SHOW MY ADVISORY!

Relevant parts
  • Mechanical pencil
  • Rubber band
Tools
  • Scissors

lines.text: Remove the top of the pencil (just pull it off with your teeth).
lines.text_raw: Remove the top of the pencil (just pull it off with your teeth).

lines.text: Cut the part where the lead ejects.
lines.text_raw: Cut the part where the lead ejects.

lines.text: Throw out the tip and save the spring as it can be useful in the future.
lines.text_raw: Throw out the tip and save the spring as it can be useful in the future.

lines.text: Cut the part on the pencil body so it is gone and cut the lead core where I did.
lines.text_raw: Cut the part on the pencil body so it is gone and cut the lead core where I did.

lines.text: Put a rubber band on the clip.
lines.text_raw: Put a rubber band on the clip.

lines.text: Pull the rubber band behind the eraser hole and insert the eraser (or use whatever works for you).
lines.text_raw: Pull the rubber band behind the eraser hole and insert the eraser (or use whatever works for you).

guide.summary: Make a DIY BB gun, but be careful and don't hurt anyone!
guide.title: DIY BB Gun
